Reviews.Title: “Great - If You're a Smoker”

Reviews.Content: travel business mean lot stayed share hotels expensive expensive bad definitely bottom 2 guess fine youre smoker dont mind carpeting drapes towels furniture bedding smell ashtray close breathing foul smell night sleep head sheets im sorry worst waking coughing 5 times throughout endless night waking eyes idea hotel stay aside smoke found cigarette holes bedspread rips sheet dont supply hangers dishwashing liquid paper towels eventhough meant call home home dont imagine brown gooey substance inside windows looked clean overall feels dirty checked nonsmoking told booked month
